committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A joint resolution to disapprove certain rules prescribed by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.
subjects: Department of Housing and Urban Development

summary.text: Disapproves certain rules of the Department of Housing and Urban Development which would: (1) require competitive bidding by borrowers under the Department's loan program for housing for the elderly or handicapped whenever a housing construction contract exceeds $100,000; (2) increase the minimum capital investment of borrowers under such program; and (3) conform cost limits on units of housing under such program to unit cost limits under a specified mortgage guarantee program.

titles.title: A joint resolution to disapprove certain rules prescribed by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.
